nodes.text: A model of landspeeder that was piloted by a human speeder pilot on the ice planet Maldo Kreis around 9 ABY. It was used to ferry the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin and his bounty, the captured Mythrol, to the Razor Crest. The landspeeder was presumably destroyed along with the pilot by a ravinak shortly after.

This particular speeder had a red color scheme and four turbines at the rear. It had a rounded, curved front and a windshield in front of the pilot's seat. With 3 seats, it could sit up to 2 passengers along with a pilot. It was also in a state of disrepair at the time of 9 ABY.
